item.title: Silver API
item.description: General API specification. Listing Requests that return multiple items are paginated by default to 30 items.

item.title: How automated invoices are generated
item.description: Each day a process runs and scans every active subscription. For each subscription schedules an invoicing job taking into account generate_after.
